an4.162:4.3: Dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.162:5.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4.162:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi tibbarāgajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:5.3: Pakatiyāpi tibbadosajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ dosajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:5.4: Pakatiyāpi tibbamohajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ mohajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:5.7: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ muduttā dandhaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
an4.162:5.8: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4.162:6.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4.162:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi tibbarāgajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:6.3: Pakatiyāpi tibbadosajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ dosajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:6.4: Pakatiyāpi tibbamohajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṃ mohajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:6.7: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ adhimattattā khippaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
an4.162:6.8: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.162:7.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4.162:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi na tibbarāgajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṃ rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:7.3: Pakatiyāpi na tibbadosajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṃ dosajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:7.4: Pakatiyāpi na tibbamohajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṃ mohajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:7.7: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ muduttā dandhaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
an4.162:7.8: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4.162:8.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4.162:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyāpi na tibbarāgajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṃ rāgajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:8.3: Pakatiyāpi na tibbadosajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṃ dosajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:8.4: Pakatiyāpi na tibbamohajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṃ mohajaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
an4.162:8.7: So imesaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ adhimattattā khippaṃ ānantariyaṃ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
an4.162:8.8: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
